title: commit b558d0 causing 7%~14% performance degradation for sysbench oltp_update_index workload
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->


### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
compare sysbench oltp_update_index workload with https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/b558d0bffc554c4c0094a483c65d95a50a4141cf
 and https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/126da29086da78bad3171975d4269ba283d133bd

### What did you expect?
no performance degradation

### What did happened?
commit b558d0 cause 7% ~ 14% performance degradation.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2316425/180250567-14cc2748-69f0-4ba2-b3a2-9acda4c7ef75.png)

comments_data.body: It is caused by https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/pull/8357, data from RocksDB 6.4 will trigger bottommost compactions in RocksDB 6.29. Will revert it later.
It doesn't affect 6.2 anymore, I removed the tag.
